27.title: T-shirt Fruit of the loom
27.description: Composition 100% cotton. Density from 160 g/m2. Printing method on light fabrics - direct digital printing. On dark fabrics - thermal films (flex). Wear resistance is guaranteed! In order that the T-shirt would serve you for a long time - we recommend washing the product inside out at a temperature up to 40 degrees, in the mode of hand or delicate washing.

28.title: T-shirt Fruit of the loom
28.description: Composition 100% cotton. Density from 160 g/m2. Printing method on light fabrics - direct digital printing. On dark fabrics - thermal films (flex). Wear resistance is guaranteed! In order that the T-shirt would serve you for a long time - we recommend washing the product inside out at a temperature of up to 40 degrees Celsius, in manual or delicate washing mode.

31.title: T-shirt Jiva
31.description: OVS is a popular and much-loved clothing brand founded in 1972 in the small Italian city of Padua. The brand is part of the Gruppo Coin company and is engaged in the production of women's, men's, children's clothing, as well as footwear and accessories.
